trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cornerstone OnDemand | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Cornerstone OnDemand with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Cornerstone OnDemand with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Cornerstone OnDemand tenant
trans-unit.target: A Cornerstone OnDemand tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cornerstone OnDemand will be able to single sign into the application at your Cornerstone OnDemand company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cornerstone OnDemand will be able to single sign into the application at your Cornerstone OnDemand company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type cornerstone ondemand.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type cornerstone ondemand.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Cornerstone OnDemand, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Cornerstone OnDemand, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cornerstone OnDemand</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cornerstone OnDemand</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cornerstone OnDemand with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cornerstone OnDemand with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Cornerstone OnDemand application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Cornerstone OnDemand application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Enable Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Enable Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Cornerstone OnDemand page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Cornerstone OnDemand page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the Cornerstone OnDemand Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.csod.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the Cornerstone OnDemand Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.csod.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Cornerstone OnDemand page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Cornerstone OnDemand page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Send the following items to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team:
trans-unit.target: Send the following items to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team:

trans-unit.source: The downloaded certificate
trans-unit.target: The downloaded certificate

trans-unit.source: The Remote Login URL value
trans-unit.target: The Remote Login URL value

trans-unit.source: The Remote Logout URL value.
trans-unit.target: The Remote Logout URL value.

trans-unit.source: Single Sign-On needs to be configured by the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.
trans-unit.target: Single Sign-On needs to be configured by the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification from the support team when the configuration has been completed.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification from the support team when the configuration has been completed.

trans-unit.source: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cornerstone OnDemand, they must be provisioned into Cornerstone OnDemand.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cornerstone OnDemand, they must be provisioned into Cornerstone OnDemand.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Cornerstone OnDemand, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Cornerstone OnDemand, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Send the information (e.g.: Name, Emial) about the Azure AD user you want to provision to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.
trans-unit.target: Send the information (e.g.: Name, Emial) about the Azure AD user you want to provision to the Cornerstone OnDemand support team.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Cornerstone OnDemand user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cornerstone OnDemand to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Cornerstone OnDemand user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cornerstone OnDemand to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Cornerstone OnDemand **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Cornerstone OnDemand **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
